intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) provides comprehensive information about the Riparian Zones Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) product within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Priority Area Monitoring component. It details the product's characteristics, methodology, potential applications, quality assessment, and technical specifications. This manual aims to guide users in effectively utilising the 2012-2018 riparian zone dataset, which offers consistent, very high-resolution delineation and characterisation of land cover and land use along major and medium-sized rivers across the EEA-38 countries and the UK.
keywords: Mapping and Assessment of Ecosystems and their Services
European Catchment and Rivers Network System
